q: According to Piaget, conservation of quantity develops during which stage?
explanation: In the concrete operational stage, children understand conservation concepts.

q: Which teaching practice respects individual differences among learners?
explanation: Flexible pacing allows learners to progress according to their abilities.

q: Learning by trial and error is associated with:
explanation: Thorndike proposed learning through trial and error.

q: Which emotion helps children develop cooperation?
explanation: Empathy helps children understand others and cooperate.

q: The main objective of primary education is to develop:
explanation: Primary education focuses on overall development of the child.

q: Which type of play involves rules and teamwork?
explanation: Cooperative play includes rules, roles, and teamwork.

q: Which evaluation uses grades and marks?
explanation: Quantitative evaluation uses numerical scores.

q: Which factor motivates learning most effectively in children?
explanation: Interest naturally motivates children to learn.

q: Which classroom activity supports social development?
explanation: Group work promotes interaction and cooperation.

q: Which ability is related to problem solving?
explanation: Reasoning helps in analyzing and solving problems.

q: Which quality helps a teacher manage classroom diversity?
explanation: Patience helps in handling diverse learning needs.

q: Which principle says development is a lifelong process?
explanation: Continuity states development occurs throughout life.

q: ‘मोहन ने पत्र लिखा।’ इस वाक्य में क्रिया का भेद है:
explanation: ‘पत्र’ कर्म है, इसलिए क्रिया सकर्मक है।

q: ‘नीला’ शब्द का भाववाचक संज्ञा रूप है:
explanation: ‘नीलापन’ गुण से बनी भाववाचक संज्ञा है।

q: निम्न में से कौन-सा वाक्य शुद्ध है?
explanation: कर्ता और क्रिया में सही लिंग-वचन है।

q: ‘लाभ’ शब्द का विलोम है:
explanation: लाभ का सामान्य विलोम हानि है।

q: निम्न में से कौन-सा शब्द तत्सम है?
explanation: ‘आकाश’ संस्कृत से लिया गया तत्सम शब्द है।

q: भाषा शिक्षण में संवाद विधि का उद्देश्य है:
explanation: संवाद से भाषा का वास्तविक प्रयोग होता है।

q: पठन कौशल के विकास में सबसे सहायक है:
explanation: निरंतर अभ्यास से पठन कौशल सुधरता है।

q: Which word is an adjective?
explanation: ‘Beautiful’ describes a noun, so it is an adjective.

q: Which sentence is in present continuous tense?
explanation: ‘Is eating’ shows present continuous tense.

q: Which skill helps students express ideas in written form?
explanation: Writing skill is used for written expression.

q: Which activity best improves reading fluency?
explanation: Reading aloud improves fluency and pronunciation.

q: Which punctuation mark shows excitement?
explanation: Exclamation mark expresses excitement or emotion.

q: Which is the correct spelling?
explanation: ‘Beautiful’ is the correct spelling.

q: Which number is divisible by 5?
explanation: Numbers ending in 0 or 5 are divisible by 5.

q: What is the sum of 125 and 75?
How many faces does a cube have?
explanation: A cube has six faces.

q: Which is the standard unit of length?
explanation: Meter is the unit of length.

q: Which fraction represents half?
explanation: One-half is written as 1/2.

q: Which operation is used to share equally?
explanation: Division is used for equal sharing.

q: Which organ pumps blood in the body?
explanation: Heart pumps blood throughout the body.

q: Which material is used to make paper?
explanation: Paper is made from wood pulp.

q: Which festival marks the beginning of a new year in many Indian states?
explanation: Baisakhi is celebrated as New Year in some regions.

q: Which sense organ helps us to see?
explanation: Eyes help us see.

q: Which practice helps reduce air pollution?
explanation: Using bicycles reduces pollution.

q: Which source of water is natural?
explanation: Well is a natural source of water.
